item.title: K8s Nginx Ingress Mod Security WAF
item.description: What the WAF? # A web application firewall (WAF) is a security tool that monitors and controls incoming traffic to a web application. It is used to protect web applications from various types of attacks, such as SQL injection, cross-site scripting (XSS), and file inclusion vulnerabilities. WAFs also help to prevent unauthorized access to sensitive data and can be used to comply with security regulations. Overall, a WAF is an important tool to help keep web applications and the data they handle secure.
